Spaces vs. DONE
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Shrine Topics: Spaces vs. DONE
By lovesaurian on Monday, May 6, 2002 - 06:10 pm:

note: for this, i'm using "_" to represent typing spaces, and if there's nothing it means done.

typing A for you password yeilds a mocchi, but typing A____ give you something completely different, not even the sub breed mocchi. on the bottom of the screen where you type the letters, there are for different spaces, but it doesn't matter which of these you use. has anyone else noticed this? i thought it might be of some value, so i posted it.

P.S. Lisa, if my IP number thingie looks different, it's cause i just got a new compie. ^_^

By Lisa Shock on Monday, May 6, 2002 - 06:18 pm:

Glad to see you got the game! We know some clues about the shrine, but don't have a complete picture yet!

By Anonymous on Monday, June 3, 2002 - 03:31 pm:

You mean that if you add spaces to the end of a password it makes a completely different monster?
Wow! I never thought the game program would count "music" different from"music_" ("music" being an example of any word you do). That is some find, lovesaurin.
